episodes.title: 0: Episode 0 - It’s the Show!
episodes.description: Internet Unicorn Kathy Campbell and Developer Advocate Jay Miller love what they do. They also love productivity and how personal it can feel. Welcome to the new show where they share that love and realness with you!

episodes.title: 1: Our Systems: The Unicorn & Silk Sonic Methods
episodes.description:
For most people, productivity starts with their system. Jay and Kathy talk about their own brand of productivity and what their personal systems look like.

**Checked Connections:**

Kathy [GOOD] - Publish Episode

Jay [GOOD] - Promote the Episode on the Socials

**New Connections:**

Jay - Add a silly quote on his notebook that makes him smile and want to write in it.

Kathy - Clean up the office and keep it clean for the next 2 weeks.

Share your connections with the #MyConduit on twitter at @conduitfm or in the Relay Discord with ?MyConduit.

episodes.title: 2: When You Can’t Even (Or Odd)
episodes.description: There were plenty of times when our hosts were incredibly stressed the last week. We weren't the only ones. Based on a request from one of our conductors (our amazing Conduit listeners), we came to talk about how we manage to be productive when we can't even (or odd).

episodes.title: 3: Getting Away, Now!
episodes.description: Looking to get away from the madness? Well, get some fun sounds and learn how to get away with us!

episodes.title: 4: Big and Little Wind Downs
episodes.description: Winding tasks down is important to make that transition to the next thing as smooth as possible. Kathy and Jay share how they perform Big and Little wind downs every day!

episodes.title: 5: Sustained Progress: Over Being Overwhelmed
episodes.description: Millennial Falcon wants to know how to make SUSTAINED progress on projects that feel more like a marathon, not a sprint. Kathy just made a big move and gives us some of the tips that she used to make this challenge a bit more manageable.

episodes.title: 6: Getting back into the Swing of Things 🏏
episodes.description: Why is there no baseball bat emoji? Nevermind. This week, we’re trying to get back into the “swing” of things. Jay share’s how he structures brain dumps to do just that.

episodes.title: 7: See, What We’re Not Gon’ Do… Saying No to Things!
episodes.description: We know we're supposed to say no but we don't! So let's talk about tips to saying no to ourselves and others.

episodes.title: 8: Fear of Success, Because if I Succeed…
episodes.description: You know what's really spooky? SUCCESS... This episode is about being afraid to succeed.

episodes.title: 9: Decision Space (The TIRE Technique)
episodes.description: It's time to fill up the TIREs and get ready for liftoff as we explore the final frontier before a good decision!

episodes.title: 10: Through the Hurt with Scotty Jackson
episodes.description: Sometimes, life hits us hard and we have to try and be productive even when it hurts. I mean physically hurts. In this special episode we have Scotty Jackson to explain to us how he strives to remain productive even when dealing with chronic pain.

episodes.title: 11: HUUUUUUUGE Opportunities For You
episodes.description: Kathy is Back and doing New Things. Jay has FOMO and wants to talk about all the benefits of doing things and the sacrifices that come with doing things.

episodes.title: 12: Con Doing It Live!
episodes.description: How does productivity differ when you’re doing it live! Is Vibing allowed? What happens when something goes wrong and you can’t just stop to do another take?

episodes.title: 13: Happiness First, Productivity Second
episodes.description: Kathy has lots to be thankful for, Jay is unfortunately unwell, but Rosemary was on standby! Time to review the end of the year and how you finish things or let them go, before getting started on the next new adventure.

episodes.title: 14: Giving Ourselves the Appropriate Amount of Expectations
episodes.description: Whether it's themes, goals, resolutions, or just living by the seat of your pants, you have to make sure the expectations you set for yourself match how the way you (Con) do things.

episodes.title: 15: Jay Has Some Big Decisions
episodes.description: Jay had some life happen and now he needs to make some decisions. Kathy is here to help break down the BIG focus and how to put all the choices through the right frame of mind.

episodes.title: 16: A Good Friend Tells You What You Already Knew
episodes.description: Whether the Bees are Buzzing or there are no bones or spoons, thank you for being a friend and telling me the thing I needed to hear.

episodes.title: 17: Space, and Related Subjects, For Your Productivity
episodes.description:
Space: The final frontier.
These are the voyages of the Starship Conduit
Its continuing mission: to explore strange new productivity systems.

Join Kathy and Jay as they discuss space and the environment you work in.

episodes.title: 18: Putting External Factors in a VICE Grip 🗜
episodes.description: Do you have a grip on productivity? Are you worried that external factors could disrupt what you’re doing at any second? Time to put things in a VICE!

episodes.title: 19: Eating the Devil’s Spaghetti: Combating Imposter Syndrome
episodes.description: How do we learn to shut up and take the compliment? How about with a fresh bowl of imp-pasta!

episodes.title: 20: Living in a World Where 'And' Exists
episodes.description: Jay has an announcement to share with the Conduit Conductors and there may be a new corhuahua in Kathy’s life.

episodes.title: 21: Plan To Be Flexible
episodes.description: Do you have a tendency to overplan? Jay and Kathy talk about how they combat over-planning as Jay gets ready for his new gig!

episodes.title: 22: You Con Clean Things Up
episodes.description: Jay is blowing the dust off some older machines and Kathy is having space issues. It's time for some spring cleaning!

episodes.title: 23: Making Do With What We Have
episodes.description: We all want the new hotness, but with chip shortages and inflation, it seems like we’ll need to make do with what we have.

episodes.title: 24: Tiny Annoying Tasks
episodes.description:
Why is it the little things that give us pause?

In this episode we talk about the most challenging of tasks, like doing TikToks and sending mail. Are printers out to get us? Yes.

episodes.title: 25: Caring to Care
episodes.description: Conduit Cares and Gives Care. We're talking about caregiving. Caring for others and Caring for ourselves.  We hope you'll care to to listen to this heartfelt episode.

episodes.title: 26: The Content Dragon Appears! 💙🐉
episodes.description: This week we have a special guest to talk about their new project, their old project, jay's projects, and starting, stopping, and gambling on projects.... (if you got to know, you know.)

episodes.title: 27: These Are The Spoons You Have
episodes.description: Kathy is joined by returning guest host Scotty J to discuss spoon and energy management as our lives increase in scope and changes.

episodes.title: 28: When Failure Happens
episodes.description:
Toxic productivity and toxic positivity are just that - TOXIC. 

Failure happens. Our goal is find the lesson from it, stay focused on our goal and adapt. 

This week we share some failure and discuss how we change our own red circles to green or yellow ones.

episodes.title: 29: Systems Check Summer 2022 ✅
episodes.description: Kathy and Jay’s systems have changed a lot since Episode 1 and so have Kathy and Jay. This episode is the first of a quarterly look at the changes that have taken place and what brought them about.

episodes.title: 30: Facing the Reality of Being a Face
episodes.description: Jay and Kathy go on a journey of what it means to be the face of something and how to adjust how that affects your day to day choices.

episodes.title: 31: Salt, Pepper, Garlic, Fall
episodes.description: Some seasons are spicy, some are nutty, and some are just relaxing. Kathy and Jay are in some new seasons and with folks heading back to school and traveling, we’re sure you can figure out how your productivity needs to adjust for the season you’re in.

episodes.title: 32: First of all, Is it Fun? With Brad Dowdy
episodes.description: This conduit, Kathy and Jay are joined by the Pen Boss himself - Brad Dowdy. The three examine their quirky roles and breakdown how they found their flow.

episodes.title: 33: 🧠🐸
episodes.description:
Life can get a little foggy, but instead let it get froggy! Leap into this episode about identifying and overcoming brain f(r)og.

Also: make sure to wish Jay a happy birthday today (10/6) on social media!!

episodes.title: 34: Debug My Nervous System
episodes.description: While Jay is off keynoting, Kathy brings James Thomson in to talk about living with chronic pain and eye problems, while being kind to yourself.

episodes.title: 35: Serious Unicorning Around
episodes.description: This episode is super seriously silly. Jay and Kathy explore some of silly habits that break up the tension in their day-to-day.

episodes.title: 36: Brain Bags 🧠 🎒👜👛
episodes.description: Kathy is away so Jay has brought bag and electronics YouTuber PK Shiu to the show to talk about what we learn in our side-hustles.

episodes.title: 37: Systems Check Fall 2022 - Systems Don’t Solve Everything
episodes.description: The bestest of system names for the bestest of friends. Kathy and Jay talk about the changes their systems have had and why it's okay to be dynamic.

episodes.title: 38: Scrape, Scrap, and Survive
episodes.description:
It's the end of the year and people are planning. Also people are planning to succeed but what does that look like and how do you help others reach it?

This week, we answer a listener question: "how do you mentor folks afraid of success?"

episodes.title: 39: Self Care Isn't Selfish
episodes.description:
Stop and Start.
More and Less.
Ends and Beginnings.

The end of the year is here so Jay and Kathy are working on what to end and what to begin when coming into 2023. Also, is Kathy ending Jay’s tenure on the show?!

episodes.title: 40: Throwing Off the Emperor's Groove
episodes.description:
It’s annoying but sometimes we have to do it. 

That said we’re wondering what are some way we can prevent the mundane from throwing us off our groove.

episodes.title: 41: Accountability: Doing it Right
episodes.description:
Accountability is a common theme in productivity, but how do you do it so that it's actually helpful? Jay and Kathy help with some tips.

Also: Announcing Super Conductor! The Conduit Membership Show that includes extra content, no ads, and a fortnightly virtual coworking meetup!

episodes.title: 42: We Asked a Lot of Questions
episodes.description:
The answer is…. Well not that important.

In this episode, we uncover our preference of solutions over answers and hope to solve an important question. 

“What did we learn from all of this?”

episodes.title: 43: Systems Check: Chugga Chugga To DO
episodes.description:
Lorem Ipsum Pikachu Conduit

Check for rags! In this episode we’re looking at how we plan for the long term and look to add (if only temporarily) to our systems.

episodes.title: 44: Taking Care of That Jar in the PreSeason
episodes.description:
Bring out the sports metaphors. Or your canning metaphor. Whatever you relate to learn how to prepare for the time where spoons are limited. Yay! Metaphors!

Become a Super Conductor and hear an extra topic this week that will become the full topic next week!

episodes.title: 45: Adjusting to Adjustments
episodes.description: We had to adjust to our last show and then make adjustment to the adjustments. Because we’re pros and pros don’t do everything perfectly. They do things and then adjust to the results!

episodes.title: 46: Feed the Ducks 🦆
episodes.description:
When life gives you rain and a leaky roof, a flooded backyard, and other stresses, go outside with a bowl of cheerios and feed some ducks.  

Visit IMASuperconductor.com to hear the aftershow where Jay and Kathy rank board games

episodes.title: 47: The Secret Soup Packing Sauce
episodes.description:
We’d love to talk about productivity but Jay and Kathy both have to catch a plane. So instead, they talk about being productive while traveling.

Visit IMASuperconductor.com to hear the aftershow where Jay tests Kathy on Wheel of Time characters...and Kathy tests Jay on pronunciations.

episodes.title: 48: Long Projects: Remove the Concept of Time
episodes.description: We've got a longer than usual period between our next live recording so we're taking the time to think about some longer connections. Tune in to hear how we're going about it and longer projects in general. Are we just making it up as we go along?

episodes.title: 49: Systems Check Spring 2023: Unicorns and Thundercats
episodes.description: In our first episode out of time, Jay and Kathy do their quarterly system check to discover what has changed and what has stayed the same!

episodes.title: 50: Friendship HIPAA
episodes.description: Jay is on location for a secret project so Kathy pulls in her other favorite cohost: Alex Cox! They both go deep into mental health in the workplace and how it affects everything.

episodes.title: 51: Touching Squishy Brains 👉🧠👈
episodes.description: Jay is back and his brain is squishier than ever… In this episode we poke and prod and talk about how to use accountability to look at the forest from the trees and tell each other "Hey you should stop that thing you’re doing at the moment and get back to what you’re supposed to be doing"

episodes.title: 52: NOTES! That right there, that’s a good thing
episodes.description: Do you write it down to remember it now, later, or NEVER! Let's talk about how we take notes.

episodes.title: 53: It's A Mess, We're A Mess, It's Messy.
episodes.description: Jay and Kathy's lives are being bombarded with unknown timelines and expectations. Will they make it through?

episodes.title: 54: The Perfect Productivity Show
episodes.description: It only happens once a year, maybe, but we’re answering questions from our amazing conductors!

episodes.title: 55: Expectations of Being in a New Space
episodes.description: Jay just moved and Kathy also moved like a month ago (or maybe two years ago) so we’re looking at some of the desires Jay has for his new space and what may be the reality of things.

episodes.title: 56: Systems Check Summer 2023: Sidetracked With Doing Stuff
episodes.description: It’s time already for another systems check and our hosts are… busy. Jay’s trying something new (and it’s not here yet!) and Kathy can’t even or odd so learn how they hope to manage in the next quarter.

episodes.title: 57: I Need Help to Get the Help
episodes.description: Kathy and Jay need help to meet the demands of those around them. They need help getting help!

episodes.title: 58: Finding Your Rhythm
episodes.description: Jay found his rhythm and rocked the stage. Kathy finds her rhythm in calls with business owners... Where do you find yours?

episodes.title: 59: Everything is Broken!
episodes.description:
Everything is broken. Everything is messed up but we still do things.
Everything is broken. F-Productivity

episodes.title: 63: Tiny Audits For a Mini-Kondo Benefit
64: Creating Productivity Software with NO PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEM!
65: Embracing the Chaos being Toxic and Positive
66: I Wish I had a Britnie
67: Plan but Be Ready To Pivot
71: This Is Good For You…You Need To Stop
73: You May Feel Some Slight Discomfort
88: More work, that’s good… I think? 🤔
89: End of the Year Systems Check!
91: Robb Knight made this for himself, and maybe you too.
93: Burning the Candle in the Name of Joy!
97: Reducing Load with the Unicorn’s Busiest Internets
98: Presentation Advice: What is Even Happening!
105: Is It OK to Not Plan For The Future??
106: This Is Not an Episode (But We're Sorry)
113: I Assure You, I Know Who I Am with Tiff Arment
